data.author: Dexterity

changelog.release_notes:
7.4 Release Notes
1. Implement XML ontimeout for watch freezing problems.
2. Implement XML onerror for logs, and to handle aborts properly.
3. Implement calls to sync error handler in all sync and message handlers, to reprocess messages and flag any freezing conditions.
4. New restart message to handle old pebble and pebble time users. Will now go to "Reload/Restart" to prompt user to reload watchface first to fix condition, and then restart watch/phone.
4. Display nothing instead of logo when receive bad icon data. For xDrip users.
5. Display nothing instead of logo when receive NON_COMPUTABLE icon data. For xDrip users.
6. New Easter eggs.

MAINTENANCE RELEASE ONLY

1. Fix for people getting CAL in raw field all the time, even after calibrating; mainly for xDrip users

*Blank timeago space has been permanently removed, which will forever cease and desist.
*Insert happy, marshmallow fluffy, dextrose like, cloud icons for timeago. 
*Take away dexcom icon for timeago, which will forever cease and desist.
*Evolve state transitions to work better together, with ambidextrous efficiency.
*Memory fixes and optimizations, which have been dexterously implemented.
*Easter eggs, new 100 / 5.5 animations. No ceasing and desisting necessary.

Release 7.1

1. New compression warning - will show COMPRESSION? when pebble detects possible compression low
2. Raw values will show between 30-500 (or MMOL equivalent), and show LO and HI outside of those values; raw values outside of those ranges will show ??
3. Timeago change so now will show last actual time received by pebble; timeago will be blank when loading or coming back from any "pebble outage" (no bluetooth,check phone, etc), and then will show timeago from last received actual reading on pebble so user can know actual last reading received
4. Time fixes so now time works across time zone changes, dexcom time changes, dexcom time drift issues, daylight savings time changes, future data point problems, xdrip time issues, and any kind of phone time issues (auto update / non auto update, etc).
5. Pebble crash fixes
6. Animation crash fixes
7. Memory problem fixes
8. Image size fixes
9. Random buzzing fixes
10. New easter egg messages

R7.0 Release Notes

1. Low vibration alert now goes down to 60.
2. If raw enabled on pebble endpoint, show calculated raw on face.
3. If raw enabled on pebble endpoint, show noise levels on face. Noise levels displayed - Cln Clean, Lgt Light, Med Medium, Hvy Heavy.
4. If raw enabled on pebble endpoint, in special values (e.g. ???) the last three calculated values will be displayed in the BG field if they exist.
5. If raw enabled on pebble endpoint, watch can vibrate on last calculated raw in special values (e.g. ???). User can set the setting in the configuration file to "Yes" or "No".
6. User can put "IOB" in T1DName in config, and if IOB is enabled on website the IOB value will show up instead of T1DName.
7. Move rig / uploader battery percentage to top half and label as "Rig".
8. Show watch battery percentage on face, and switch percentage to CHARGING when plugged in. Label as "Wch".
9. Extend RESTRT timeout so that it appears after NO BLUETOOTH timeout, and really only appears when needed.
10. Extend DATA timeout so that it appears after CHECK PHONE timeout, and really only appears when needed.
11. Change RESTRT WCH/PHN message to √APP/RESTRT, to instruct apple users to open their app, and instruct everyone to restart their watch and phone if necessary.
12. Change DATA OFFLINE message to ATTN: NO DATA to warn users that there is a problem getting data but imply we are still trying to get data and will clear the message when we can.
13. Change CHECK CGM message to CHECK RIG to clarify to the user that they need to check the entire rig, not just the CGM.
14. Ability to set custom and multiple animation messages at different BG levels in the code.

1. Extended timeout for DATA OFFLINE condition
2. Extended timeout for RSTRT WCH/PH condition
3. Added vibe for DATA OFFLINE condition
4. Don't wipeout screen for DATA OFFLINE condition

1. Fix for watch freezing
2. Fix for ERR codes
3. Fix for HTML timeouts
4. New global variable to turn off all vibrations (HardCode)
5. New slot2 loads have new config files

CGM Sleep Face, based on R5.2
SPECIAL PEBBLE CGM WATCHFACE THAT TURNS OFF ALL VIBRATIONS. Use this for my son who wears the pebble watch during his naps and at night. Also use it when I have to focus on other things like work, get some sleep while other parent is on diabetes duty, etc. Distinctive watchface in that colors are reversed so you know it's running and that vibrations are off. Can be run alongside regular CGM watchface.

data.description: SPECIAL WATCHFACE THAT TURNS OFF ALL VIBRATIONS Useful for children who wear the pebble watch during naps and at night. Also useful when adults have to focus on other things like work, get some sleep while other parent is on diabetes duty, etc. Distinctive watchface in that colors are reversed so you know it’s running and that vibrations are off. Can be run alongside regular CGM watchface.

data.title: Sleep CGM In The Cloud Slot 1
